## `gdocker images`

List and inspect available Docker images in a specified directory.

To see help and available options for this command:

```{bash}
gdocker help images
```

Example: List all images in the `docker_images` directory in TSV format and format the output as a pretty table using [`csvtk`](https://github.com/shenwei356/csvtk):

```{bash}
gdocker images -e -b | csvtk pretty -t
```
